attributes.action: During Coronavirus outbreak help those who are living illegally in UK
attributes.additional_details: During this Coronavirus outbreak and lockdown period all the legal resident somehow get benefits cause they pay Taxes but those who are illegals and aren’t pay taxes but they pay VAT on everything they buy in UK somehow they pay taxes as well but if we wasn’t paying taxes because we wasn’t getting the minimum wage too the small business runners who were paying us cash in hand they were keeping that money which should go as in taxes now during outbreak The government pass their loans too we just want Boris Johnson to consider this petition as a human being and take action for those who are living illegal in UK we should be consider as human being too thank you
attributes.background: We want government to legalise those who are living in UK illegally cause during this Coronavirus outbreak legal citizen somehow get benefits but illegal immigrants nobody is willing to help them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
